remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要繪製在 Windows 表單中，您應該使用其中一個方法。To draw an on a Windows Form, you should use one of the methods. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例被設計為搭配 Windows Form。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms. 它是處理常式事件。It is a handler for the event. A物件會傳遞至事件，並會用來在表單上繪製影像。A object is passed to the event and is used to draw the image on the form. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 從名為 SampImag.jpg 檔案建立映像。Creates an image from a file named SampImag.jpg. 這個檔案必須位於與應用程式可執行檔相同的資料夾。This file must be located in the same folder as the application executable file. - 建立在該處描繪影像的左上角的點。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 在表單上繪製無縮放的影像。Draws the unscaled image on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回多重框架影像，有兩種樣式的相關資訊： 多個頁面和多個解決方案。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多頁映像會包含一個以上的映像的映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每個頁面包含單一的 「 映像 」 （或稱 「 框架 」）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 這些頁面 （或映像或畫面格） 通常會產生動畫的序列，例如動畫的.gif 檔案的連續顯示。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多個高解析度的影像是包含一份以上的不同解析度的映像的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 這常用的 MIP 對應，顯示的影像大小會決定用於繪製影像的解析度。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可支援任意數目的頁面 （或映像或畫面格），以及任意數目的解決方法。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定義的維度是屬性。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed GDI + 具有內建的編碼器和解碼器，支援下列檔案類型：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 檔案會維持鎖定直到處置。The file remains locked until the is disposed. 如果檔案沒有有效的影像格式，或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支援像素格式的檔案，這個方法會擲回例外狀況。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援在點陣圖的 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要啟用 alpha 透明度，使用每像素 32 位元中的 PNG 影像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼至表單，並處理表單的藉由呼叫的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks Managed GDI + 具有內建的編碼器和解碼器，支援下列檔案類型：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 如果檔案沒有有效的影像格式，或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支援像素格式的檔案，這個方法會擲回例外狀況。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. 檔案會維持鎖定直到處置。The file remains locked until the is disposed. `useEmbeddedColorManagement`參數會指定是否新套用色彩修正根據內嵌在影像檔的色彩管理資訊。The `useEmbeddedColorManagement` parameter specifies whether the new applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the image file. 國際色彩協會 (ICC) 設定檔、 gamma 數值及色度資訊，可以包含內嵌的資訊。Embedded information can include International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information. > [!NOTE] > 類別不支援在點陣圖的 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要啟用 alpha 透明度，使用每像素 32 位元中的 PNG 影像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得新的點陣圖使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它也會示範。It also demonstrates a . 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立包含名為按鈕的表單`Button2`。Create a form containing a button named `Button2`. 程式碼貼入表單，並將產生關聯`Button2_Click`方法，按鈕之事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回多重框架影像，有兩種樣式的相關資訊： 多個頁面和多個解決方案。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多頁映像會包含一個以上的映像的映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每個頁面包含單一的 「 映像 」 （或稱 「 框架 」）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 這些頁面 （或映像或畫面格） 通常會產生動畫的序列，例如動畫的.gif 檔案的連續顯示。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多個高解析度的影像是包含一份以上的不同解析度的映像的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 這常用的 MIP 對應，顯示的影像大小會決定用於繪製影像的解析度。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可支援任意數目的頁面 （或映像或畫面格），以及任意數目的解決方法。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定義的維度是屬性。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會旋轉影像順時針旋轉。The method rotates the image clockwise. 如果您想要繪製的映像上已在旋轉之後，您應一律擷取新的圖形物件從映像，否則可能會發生例外狀況。If you wish to draw on an image once it has been rotated, you should always retrieve a new graphics object from the image, otherwise an exception could occur. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法而列舉型別。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method on an and the enumeration. 這個範例設計來搭配 Windows 表單，其中包含名為`PictureBox1`和名為按鈕`Button1`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a named `PictureBox1` and a button named `Button1`. 程式碼貼入表單中，呼叫`InitializeBitmap`從表單的建構函式，並產生關聯`Button1_Click`按鈕之事件。Paste the code into a form, call `InitializeBitmap` from the form's constructor, and associate `Button1_Click` with the button's event. 請確定您的系統上的點陣圖的檔案路徑無效。Ensure the file path to the bitmap is valid on your system. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有編碼器有映像的檔案格式，則會使用可攜式網路圖形 (PNG) 編碼器。If no encoder exists for the file format of the image, the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoder is used. 當您使用方法，將圖形影像儲存為 Windows 中繼檔格式 (WMF) 」 或 「 增強型中繼檔格式 (EMF) 檔案時，所產生的檔案會另存為可攜式網路圖形 (PNG) 檔。When you use the method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. 發生此行為的原因[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]元件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]並沒有您可以將檔案儲存為.wmf 或.emf 檔案使用的編碼器。This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files. 將影像儲存至所建構的相同檔案時，不允許，且會擲回例外狀況。Saving the image to the same file it was constructed from is not allowed and throws an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 建立表單，其中包含一個按鈕名為`Button5`。Create a form that contains a button named `Button5`. 程式碼貼入表單和按鈕的相關聯的方法事件。Paste the code into the form, and associate the method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果影像格式不支援屬性項目，這個方法會擲回訊息 「 屬性不支援 」。If the image format does not support property items, this method throws with the message "Property not supported." 如果影像格式支援屬性項目，但不支援您嘗試設定的特定屬性，這個方法會忽略該嘗試，但並不會擲回例外狀況。If the image format supports property items but does not support the particular property you are attempting to set, this method ignores the attempt but does not throw an exception. 因為很難設定屬性項目，類別有沒有公用建構函式。It is difficult to set property items, because the class has no public constructors. 若要解決此限制的一個方法就是取得藉由擷取屬性值或呼叫方法已有此屬性的項目。One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a by retrieving the property value or calling the method of an that already has property items. 然後您可以設定的欄位並將它傳遞給。Then you can set the fields of the and pass it to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要執行此範例中，將它貼至表單，並處理表單的藉由呼叫的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as .
